p: The impact of climate change could particularly impact S치mi youth health as they become the next generation of reindeer herders and members of the surrounding S치mi community which, due to geography, is more likely to be strongly impacted by climate change [ 5]. The S치mi Arctic youth are also in an area with lower social determinants of health which could potentially include a previously unexplored link with the environment and climate change which has been recorded to be very important for the S치mi historically [ 12].
